00022 #ifndef _CHIPSTREAM_METAPROBESET_H_
00023 #define _CHIPSTREAM_METAPROBESET_H_
00024 
00025 //
00026 #include "file/TsvFile/TsvFile.h"
00027 #include "util/FrugalVector.h"
00028 //
00029 #include <vector>
00030 
00031 /** Very basic class to store the meta probesets (groups of probesets)
00032     that a user specifies for analysis. */
00033 class MetaProbeset {
00034     public:
00035         const char *name;
00036                 const char *displayName;
00037         FrugalVector<const char *> probesets;
00038         bool freeSubs;
00039 
00040         MetaProbeset();
00041         ~MetaProbeset();
00042 
00043         /** 
00044         * Read in a subset of probes to be processed. Can be probeset ids or names
00045         * depending on the options.
00046         * 
00047         * @param tsv - File to read from.
00048         * @param metaSets - Meta probeset vector to fill in.
00049         */
00050         static void readProbesetSubset(affx::TsvFile &tsv, std::vector<MetaProbeset *> &metaSets);
00051 
00052         /** 
00053         * Read in a grouping file for probesets which merges probesets into larger
00054         * probesets called "meta" probesets. Requires at least two columns of data,
00055         * a probeset_id for the newly created probeset and a probeset_list which 
00056         * contains a space separated list of probesets to merge.
00057         * 
00058         * @param tsv - File to read meta probesets from.
00059         * @param metaSets - Meta probesets to fill in from file.
00060         */
00061         static void readMetaProbesetList(affx::TsvFile &tsv, std::vector<MetaProbeset *> &metaSets);
00062 
00063         /** 
00064         * Open a file that could be either a meta probesets file or a subset list
00065         * of probesets and fill in the metaSets vector appropriately.
00066         * 
00067         * @param o - Options
00068         * @param metaSets - Vector to be filled in with resulting probests or meta probests.
00069         */
00070         static void readMetaProbesets(const std::string fileName, const bool metaFile, std::vector<MetaProbeset *> &metaSets);
00071 };
00072 
00073 #endif /* _CHIPSTREAM_METAPROBESET_H_ */
